alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 3:44PM CDT until April 12 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern La Crosse County in west central Wisconsin... Central Monroe County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 343 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bangor, or 7 miles west of Sparta, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...La Crosse airport reported 67 mph wind gust at 332 pm. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sparta around 350 PM CDT. Fort Mc Coy around 400 PM CDT. Tomah around 410 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Warrens, Rockland, Oakdale, County Roads D E And E, Valley Junction, Jellystone Park Near Warrens and Highway 33 And County O A. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 136 and 147. Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 46 and 51. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 9 and 45. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
